posts.post_title: T206 EPDG Lot x 2 PSA Graded
posts.post_content:
Hi John,
 
The two T206 EPDG cards safely arrived last week.  I just wanted to thank you again for the great packaging and cards, and give your post a nice positive feedback bump.

They are great additions to my collection and thanks again for the smooth transaction!

Rick.
